core.name: CORE
core.fullDescription: Personal AI Infrastructure core. AUTO-LOADS at session start. USE WHEN any session begins OR user asks about identity, response format, contacts, stack preferences, security protocols, or asset management.

autodocs.name: AutoDocs
autodocs.fullDescription: Auto-generates README.md and ARCHITECTURE.md documentation. USE WHEN git pre-commit triggers OR user requests documentation generation OR user says "generate readme" OR "update architecture" OR "generate docs".

prompting.name: Prompting
prompting.fullDescription: Meta-prompting system for dynamic prompt generation using templates, standards, and patterns. USE WHEN meta-prompting, template generation, prompt optimization, or programmatic prompt composition.

investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.fullDescription: Analyzes repositories to understand architecture and provide implementation guidance. USE WHEN investigate repo OR analyze codebase OR understand architecture OR how to implement OR explore project structure OR onboard to new project.

createskill.name: CreateSkill
createskill.fullDescription: Create and validate skills. USE WHEN create skill, new skill, skill structure, canonicalize. SkillSearch('createskill') for docs.
